statements: SELECT * FROM peer_review_data;
SELECT review_id, reviewer_username FROM peer_review_data ORDER BY review_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM peer_review_data WHERE completion_status = 'Completed';
SELECT review_id, reviewer_username, completed_date FROM peer_review_data WHERE completed_date >= '2022-03-15';
SELECT MAX(review_id) AS max_review_id FROM peer_review_data;
SELECT * FROM peer_review_data WHERE completion_status = 'Completed' ORDER BY completed_date DESC;
SELECT reviewer_username, COUNT(review_id) AS review_count FROM peer_review_data GROUP BY reviewer_username HAVING review_count > 3;
SELECT reviewer_username, completion_status FROM peer_review_data WHERE completion_status IN ('Completed', 'In Progress') ORDER BY reviewer_username ASC, completion_status DESC;
SELECT reviewer_username, completed_date FROM peer_review_data WHERE completed_date >= '2022-01-01' AND completion_status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY completed_date ASC;
SELECT AVG(review_id) AS avg_review_id FROM peer_review_data WHERE completion_status = 'Completed';
SELECT * FROM peer_reviews WHERE review_score > 3;
SELECT id, reviewer_id, reviewee_id FROM peer_reviews WHERE review_score < 2;
SELECT reviewer_id, AVG(review_score) AS average_score FROM peer_reviews GROUP BY reviewer_id;
SELECT name, reviews_completed FROM reviewers ORDER BY reviews_completed DESC;
SELECT * FROM peer_reviews JOIN reviewers ON peer_reviews.reviewer_id = reviewers.id;
SELECT * FROM peer_reviews WHERE review_score > 3 ORDER BY review_completion_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT reviewer_id, AVG(review_score) as avg_score FROM peer_reviews GROUP BY reviewer_id HAVING COUNT(reviewee_id) > 5;
SELECT p.*, r.name as reviewer_name FROM peer_reviews p INNER JOIN reviewers r ON p.reviewer_id = r.id WHERE r.expertise = 'Data Science';
SELECT * FROM peer_reviews ORDER BY review_score DESC, review_completion_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT r.name as reviewer_name, COUNT(p.id) as total_reviews FROM peer_reviews p INNER JOIN reviewers r ON r.id = p.reviewer_id GROUP BY r.name HAVING COUNT(p.id) > 3;
SELECT * FROM PeerReviewCompletionRates WHERE completion_rate > 0.8;
SELECT reviewer_id, AVG(completion_rate) AS avg_completion_rate FROM PeerReviewCompletionRates GROUP BY reviewer_id;
SELECT report_name, report_description FROM CustomizableReports WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT reviewer_id, total_reviews, avg_rating FROM ReviewerPerformance WHERE total_reviews > 10 ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM PeerReviewCompletionRates WHERE reviewer_id = 3 AND paper_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM PeerReviewCompletionRates WHERE completion_rate > 0.8;
SELECT reviewer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_reviews FROM ReviewerPerformance GROUP BY reviewer_id ORDER BY total_reviews DESC;
SELECT reviewer_id, avg_rating FROM ReviewerPerformance WHERE avg_rating >= 4.5;
SELECT reviewer_id, total_reviews, avg_rating FROM ReviewerPerformance WHERE total_reviews > 10 ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;
SELECT report_name, report_description FROM CustomizableReports WHERE report_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM peer_reviews;
SELECT id, completion_rate, reviewer_id FROM peer_reviews;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM reviewers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT reviewer_id, COUNT(*) as review_count FROM review_performance GROUP BY reviewer_id;
SELECT * FROM peer_reviews WHERE completion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT reviewer_id, AVG(completion_rate) AS avg_completion_rate FROM peer_reviews GROUP BY reviewer_id;
SELECT r.id, r.name, rp.review_count FROM reviewers r JOIN review_performance rp ON r.id = rp.reviewer_id;
SELECT * FROM reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT r.name AS reviewer_name, p.completion_rate AS performance_score FROM reviewers r JOIN peer_reviews p ON r.id = p.reviewer_id WHERE p.completion_rate > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM peer_review_completion_rates;
SELECT reviewer_id, count(*) as total_reviews FROM peer_reviews GROUP BY reviewer_id;
SELECT pc.id, pc.completion_date, r.performance_score FROM peer_review_completion_rates pc INNER JOIN reviewer_performance r ON pc.reviewer_id = r.reviewer_id;
SELECT rc.comment_id, rc.comment_text, r.reviewer_name FROM review_comments rc INNER JOIN reviewers r ON rc.commenter_id = r.reviewer_id;
SELECT p.review_id, p.review_date, r.reviewer_name, r.reviewer_department FROM peer_reviews p INNER JOIN reviewers r ON p.reviewer_id = r.reviewer_id;
SELECT * FROM peer_review_completion_rates WHERE completion_date >= '2022-02-01'
SELECT reviewer_id, performance_score FROM reviewer_performance ORDER BY performance_score DESC, reviewer_id ASC
SELECT reviewer_name, reviewer_email, reviewer_department FROM reviewers WHERE reviewer_department = 'Engineering' LIMIT 5
SELECT review_id, review_date, reviewer_id, reviewee_id FROM peer_reviews WHERE review_date < '2022-01-01' AND reviewer_id = 123
SELECT comment_id, comment_text FROM review_comments WHERE commenter_id = 456 ORDER BY comment_id DESC
